about.name: Cannes
about.info_text: Cannes is a picturesque city located on the French Riviera in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region of France. It is famous for its beautiful Mediterranean beaches, upscale shopping, and the internationally renowned Cannes Film Festival. The city is a playground for the rich and famous, with its luxurious hotels, exquisite dining, and a vibrant nightlife scene. Visitors can explore the charming Old Town (Le Suquet), relax on the sandy shores, and take in the stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea. Cannes offers a unique blend of culture, glamour, and natural beauty.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 74,000
Official Language: French
Currency: Euro (EUR)
Time Zone: Central European Time (CET, UTC+01:00)
Climate: Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

attractions_card.title: Cannes Film Festival
attractions_card.description: One of the most prestigious film festivals in the world, where celebrities and filmmakers gather to showcase and celebrate cinematic art.

attractions_card.title: La Croisette
attractions_card.description: A famous waterfront promenade lined with palm trees, luxury boutiques, and upscale hotels, offering stunning views of the Mediterranean.

attractions_card.title: Le Suquet (Old Town)
attractions_card.description: Explore the historic Old Town with its narrow streets, charming squares, and the iconic Musée de la Castre.

attractions_card.alt: Palais des Festivals et des Congrès
attractions_card.title: Palais des Festivals
attractions_card.description: The venue for the Cannes Film Festival and other major events, known for its striking architectural design.

attractions_card.title: Îles de Lérins
attractions_card.description: A group of beautiful islands, including Île Sainte-Marguerite and Île Saint-Honorat, offering natural beauty, historical sites, and tranquility.

attractions_card.title: Museums and Galleries
attractions_card.description: Cannes boasts a range of cultural institutions, including the Musée de la Castre and the Musée de la Mer.

attractions_card.title: Beaches
attractions_card.description: Relax on the sandy shores of Cannes, including Plage de la Croisette, Plage de la Bocca, and more.

attractions_card.title: Shopping and Dining
attractions_card.description: Indulge in upscale shopping at designer boutiques and savor gourmet French cuisine at the city's fine dining restaurants.

food_card.title: French Cuisine
food_card.description: Enjoy classic French dishes such as coq au vin, bouillabaisse, and escargot at Cannes' renowned restaurants.

food_card.title: Mediterranean Delights
food_card.description: Savor Mediterranean flavors with fresh seafood, olive oil, and herbs in dishes like grilled fish and seafood stew.

food_card.title: Patisseries and Desserts
food_card.description: Treat yourself to delectable pastries, macarons, and crème brûlée at local patisseries and dessert shops.

food_card.title: Cafés and Coffee
food_card.description: Relax at charming cafés, enjoying espresso and people-watching along the promenade.

hotels_card.title: Luxury Resorts
hotels_card.description: Cannes offers a range of luxury resorts and hotels with lavish amenities and scenic views of the Mediterranean.

hotels_card.title: Boutique Hotels
hotels_card.description: Stay in boutique hotels with unique character and personalized service in the heart of the city.

hotels_card.title: Seaside Villas
hotels_card.description: Experience the charm of Cannes in seaside villas and apartments available for rent.

hotels_card.title: Budget Accommodations
hotels_card.description: Budget-conscious travelers can find comfortable and affordable hotels in Cannes.

transport_card.title: Nice Côte d'Azur Airport
transport_card.description: The nearest major airport serving Cannes, providing domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: Train Services
transport_card.description: Cannes is well-connected by train, with services to other French cities and nearby destinations.

transport_card.title: Public Transport
transport_card.description: Explore Cannes and its surroundings using the city's efficient bus services.

transport_card.title: Walking
transport_card.description: Cannes is a walkable city, making it easy to explore the streets, beaches, and attractions on foot.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Car rentals are available for those who wish to explore the French Riviera and its scenic coastal roads.
